summary: MY 2002 ENVOY EXHIBITS THE SAME SYMPTOMS AS MY PREVIOUS GMC JIMMY. IT HAS A HESITATION ON ACCELERATION THAT FAILS TO SHIFT FROM 1-2 PROPERLY. THIS ONLY OCCURS WHEN THE CAR IS COLD AND ONLY FOR A MILE OR TWO. HOWEVER , IT CAUSES SEVERE LOSS OF POWER AND ACCELERATION CAPABILITY. OBVIOUSLY OTHER PEOPLE HAVE THIS PROBLEM BUT IT DOES NOT APPEAR THAT THERE IS A SOLUTION. IT ALWAYS WORKS BY THE TIME IT GETS TO THE DEALER, OF COURSE.    *NLM
